name: Bar Keep
description:
Take a role of cowboy in the middle of the desert and save your bar. Invite your fellow friends and enjoy our two-days development game!

2D Design - Matus Chlebuch, Alexander Horvath, Kristian Kollar
Animations - Alexander Horvath, Kristian Kollar
Sound Effects & Music - Patrik Jesko
Programming & Technical Work - Matej Vanco

Classical Nintendo NES controllers supported!
